UniswapEthereumParser.query: { pools(skip: %s, first: %s, orderBy: feesUSD, orderDirection: desc) { id token0 { id symbol name } token1 { id symbol name } feeTier poolDayData(first: 1, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc) { date token0Price token1Price liquidity volumeUSD volumeToken0 volumeToken1 tvlUSD } } }
